OCD.description: Provides proxy connection and data transfer of measurements from Mettler laboratory weight balances.
OCD.name: Mettler Proxy

AD.name: Connection uri
AD.description: URI to connect to the balance. Example socket://192.168.0.116:2345

AD.name: Wiring group name
AD.description: Name of the group of components that will be wired together.

AD.name: Request command
AD.description: Command to request information from the balance. Example SI%13%%10%

AD.name: Response pattern
AD.description: Pattern to use to parse return response from the balance. Example SI%13%%10%

AD.name: Connection retry interval seconds
AD.description: Seconds to wait before retrying to establish a connection to the balance.

AD.name: Producer Scope for the weight measurement
AD.description: Name of the product created by this wire producer and sent to wire consumers.

AD.name: Component container label
AD.description: Name to label node in the iRouter Monitor View graphics.
